root.name: Pac-Man Collection
root.description: OverviewA compilation of Pac-Man versions and hacks. The games included as follows:Pac-ManPuck-Man (Different mazes)Hangly-Man (Hack of Pac-Man)Ultra Pac-ManRandom MazesMs. Pac-ManPac-AttackMs. Random MazesThere is also a "Plus" set of effects you can turn on or off.Increased game speedPrizesMonsters turn invisible and are worth double points if foundEating an energizer doesn't turn all of the monsters blue.Eating an energizer makes the maze and the dots disappear.Maze colors are different.
